title: Frozen In Terror: Extremely Well-Preserved Ancient Mummies Found In Iran
content: An ancient salt mine in Iran naturally preserved dead miners for thousands of years in a grisly state - some of them frozen with their arms still raised before being buried alive.
summary: An ancient salt mine in Iran naturally preserved dead miners for thousands of years in a grisly state - some of them frozen with their arms still raised before being buried alive.

title: "Abandon Blind Bias": Hamas Urges US Pressure On Netanyahu For Gaza Deal
content: Hamas called on the United States Thursday to "exert real pressure" on Israel to reach a Gaza ceasefire agreement as Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu said there was no deal in the making.
summary: Hamas called on the United States Thursday to "exert real pressure" on Israel to reach a Gaza ceasefire agreement as Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu said there was no deal in the making.

title: US School Shooting Suspect's Father Arrested. He Bought Him Gun As Gift
content: The shooting at Apalachee High School in Georgia's Winder saw two teachers and two 14-year-old students being killed.
summary: The shooting at Apalachee High School in Georgia's Winder saw two teachers and two 14-year-old students being killed.

title: "Wanted To Play": Roller-Skating Gaza Girl, 10, Killed In Israeli Strike
content: Now that Tala is gone, her parents and brothers are left to marvel at their bad luck, with the strike landing during one of the rare occasions Hussam let one of his children go outside.
summary: Now that Tala is gone, her parents and brothers are left to marvel at their bad luck, with the strike landing during one of the rare occasions Hussam let one of his children go outside.

title: 'Nostradamus' Of US Presidential Elections Makes Final Prediction For 2024
content: Allan Lichtman, often dubbed the "Nostradamus" of US Presidential Polls, predicted that Kamala Harris would win the White House in November's poll.
summary: Allan Lichtman, often dubbed the "Nostradamus" of US Presidential Polls, predicted that Kamala Harris would win the White House in November's poll.

title: Barack Obama's "Republican" Half-Brother Says He Will Vote For Trump
content: Former US president Barack Obama's half-brother Abon'go Malik Obama declared that he would be voting for Donald Trump in the upcoming presidential elections.
summary: Former US president Barack Obama's half-brother Abon'go Malik Obama declared that he would be voting for Donald Trump in the upcoming presidential elections.

title: The Man Who Predicted Hamas' October 7 Invasion Of Israel Days In Advance
content: In a forecast that went largely unnoticed, Yigal Carmon, a prominent counter-terrorism expert and founder of the Middle East Media Research Institute (MEMRI), predicted Hamas' violent invasion of Israel on October 7, 2023, a month before it occurred.
summary: In a forecast that went largely unnoticed, Yigal Carmon, a prominent counter-terrorism expert and founder of the Middle East Media Research Institute (MEMRI), predicted Hamas' violent invasion of Israel on October 7, 2023, a month before it occurred.

title: Factbox: What New Proposals Did Trump Make During His Economic Speech?
content: Republican presidential candidate Donald Trump laid out his economic vision for the country on Thursday during a speech at the New York Economic Club.
summary: Republican presidential candidate Donald Trump laid out his economic vision for the country on Thursday during a speech at the New York Economic Club.

title: "You're Going To Be Abandoned If...": Trump's Warning To Jewish Donors
content: Republican presidential candidate Donald Trump told Jewish donors on Thursday that U.S. universities would lose accreditation and federal support over what he described as "antisemitic propaganda" if he is elected to the White House.
summary: Republican presidential candidate Donald Trump told Jewish donors on Thursday that U.S. universities would lose accreditation and federal support over what he described as "antisemitic propaganda" if he is elected to the White House.

title: 14-Year-Old Boy Charged With Killing Four In US School Shooting
content: A 14-year-old boy has been charged with shooting four people dead at a US high school, authorities said Thursday, adding that their investigation into the country's latest outburst of gun violence is ongoing.
summary: A 14-year-old boy has been charged with shooting four people dead at a US high school, authorities said Thursday, adding that their investigation into the country's latest outburst of gun violence is ongoing.

title: Telegram Chief Durov Blasts "Surprising" And "Misguided" French Charges
content: Telegram founder and chief executive Pavel Durov on Thursday hit out at France for arresting and charging him last month over the publication of extremist and illegal content on the popular messaging app.
summary: Telegram founder and chief executive Pavel Durov on Thursday hit out at France for arresting and charging him last month over the publication of extremist and illegal content on the popular messaging app.

title: Blinken Presses Israel, Hamas On Gaza Truce, Says "90 Percent Agreed"
content: US Secretary of State Antony Blinken on Thursday urged both Israel and Hamas to finalize a Gaza truce, standing by US assessments that 90 percent of a deal was ready.
summary: US Secretary of State Antony Blinken on Thursday urged both Israel and Hamas to finalize a Gaza truce, standing by US assessments that 90 percent of a deal was ready.

title: Joe Biden's Son Hunter Officially Pleads Guilty In Tax Evasion Case
content: US President Joe Biden's son, Hunter, pleaded guilty Thursday to all nine tax charges he faced, without reaching a deal with prosecutors.
summary: US President Joe Biden's son, Hunter, pleaded guilty Thursday to all nine tax charges he faced, without reaching a deal with prosecutors.

title: If Elected To Power, Will Appoint Elon Musk To Lead...: Trump
content: Donald Trump announced Thursday that if elected president he would appoint billionaire Elon Musk to lead an audit of government spending and implement "drastic" reform.
summary: Donald Trump announced Thursday that if elected president he would appoint billionaire Elon Musk to lead an audit of government spending and implement "drastic" reform.

title: US Navy Secretary Violates Law With Political Statement On Biden, Trump
content: US Navy Secretary Carlos Del Toro violated a law limiting political activity by federal employees when he publicly advocated voting for President Joe Biden and criticized former President Donald Trump, the Office of Special Counsel said on Thursday.
summary: US Navy Secretary Carlos Del Toro violated a law limiting political activity by federal employees when he publicly advocated voting for President Joe Biden and criticized former President Donald Trump, the Office of Special Counsel said on Thursday.

title: Don't Cross "Red Lines" On Ukraine Issue, Russia Warns US
content: Foreign Minister Sergey Lavrov has warned the US not to cross Russia's "red lines" on the Ukraine conflict, asserting that Washington is starting to lose its sense of mutual restraint with Moscow, state-owned TASS news agency reported.
summary: Foreign Minister Sergey Lavrov has warned the US not to cross Russia's "red lines" on the Ukraine conflict, asserting that Washington is starting to lose its sense of mutual restraint with Moscow, state-owned TASS news agency reported.

title: Putin Says Main Aim In Ukraine To Capture Eastern Donbas Area
content: Russian President Vladimir Putin on Thursday said his main aim in Ukraine after 30 months of fighting was to capture the eastern Donbas area -- and claimed that Ukraine's Kursk counter-offensive had made that easier.
summary: Russian President Vladimir Putin on Thursday said his main aim in Ukraine after 30 months of fighting was to capture the eastern Donbas area -- and claimed that Ukraine's Kursk counter-offensive had made that easier.

title: Impact On Justin Trudeau's Government As Key Sikh Ally Withdraws Support
content: An already beleaguered Justin Trudeau has been left in a politically precarious place as key ally Jagmeet Singh's New Democratic Party (NDP) withdrew support for his minority Liberal government ahead of the general election next year.
summary: An already beleaguered Justin Trudeau has been left in a politically precarious place as key ally Jagmeet Singh's New Democratic Party (NDP) withdrew support for his minority Liberal government ahead of the general election next year.

title: 60% Of People Are Missing These Four Key Nutrients In Their Diets
content: The study is the first to provide global estimates of inadequate micronutrient intake across 185 countries. Researchers found widespread deficiencies, with iodine, vitamin E, calcium, and iron being particularly low in diets worldwide.
summary: The study is the first to provide global estimates of inadequate micronutrient intake across 185 countries. Researchers found widespread deficiencies, with iodine, vitamin E, calcium, and iron being particularly low in diets worldwide.

title: Hunter Biden, Son Of US President Joe Biden, Offers Guilty Plea In Tax Case
content: Hunter Biden, the son of US President Joe Biden, offered a guilty plea to charges in his tax evasion case Thursday, just as jury selection was about to begin.
summary: Hunter Biden, the son of US President Joe Biden, offered a guilty plea to charges in his tax evasion case Thursday, just as jury selection was about to begin.
